website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy lock and cable that one user deemed “imposing." It can deter thieves, but it's also a bit bulky for some frames.
pros: Mounting bracket fits most cylindrical frames and can adapt to fit other tubing types
cons: A few reports of tumbler mechanism loosening and refusing to lock
Cable and lock are a bit bulky

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best lock for the price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best lock for the price, little bit cumbersome but the bike lock mount makes it much more manageable. Value against price, can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Max Merdzanoski

customer_reviews.title: Solid. Secure. And, yes... Sexy!
customer_reviews.text: This is one solid piece of protection! Just handling this lock during installation made me smile. Not only is the weight of this lock impressive. But, it's sexy too! The rubberized coating on either side of the keyhole, along the base, is genius! I can tell this will come in handy while trying to lock up my bike in a downpour of rain. The versatility in positioning the mounting bracket, plus the quick release button is fantastic. SIGTUNA is the new Go-To Bike Authority! I look forward to seeing what other products they develop .... BRAVO!!
customer_reviews.author: MTCampbell

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! I bought this lock last fall, used it maybe 3 times and stored it indoors; it never was exposed to rain or water. Went to use it again since it's nice out and the lock was jammed. I followed the recommendations in the question section and no luck on getting it unlocked. I emailed the lock manufacturer 10+ days ago and no response of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Won't open and bike is locked to my carrier
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a decent lock then about 7 months into using it, my key wouldn't work anymore. Since it came with two keys, I used the second one that I kept in my drawer and it worked fine. I was hesitant to use as was afraid it would eventually not open but I was a fool to think it wouldn't. Thank heavens it was only on my car and not on some trail somewhere leaving me stranded. I'll gonna have to get an angle grinder to get it off. What a mess! Don't trust this product with your wheels!
customer_reviews.author: Micky

customer_reviews.title: seems to be very sturdy. but the key and lock feel really sloppy ...
customer_reviews.text: seems to be very sturdy. but the key and lock feel really sloppy like it could be picked easy.time will tell hope not use it on my 2018 RAD ROVER.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Made Lock.
customer_reviews.text: Where in the world did all did these rave reviews come from? I received my lock not even a week ago and already the lock function completely stopped working. The lock itself is made in China and it feels like a huge clunk of plastic. Not worth the price in the least bit.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Lock. Quality Control Issue ...
customer_reviews.text: The bike lock keys don’t even work, all three of them. I missed a day of work today because I wasn’t able to lock this bike up at the station, so I had to turn back and go home. I hate leaving negative reviews, but this was absolutely necessary. Please watch my video it shows clearly how this lock is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Bought two locks on April 15th. Went on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two locks on April 15th. Went on my first bike ride on May 31st. Attempted to lock bike but locking mechanism jammed. Lock worthless and was out on a bike ride and unable lock my bike and join my friend for dinner. If I could rate negative stars I would. I will update if manufacturer responds and fixes. Hope my partners bike lock doesn't do the same thing we they attempt to use theirs.
customer_reviews.author: MN Boulevard

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for a few months
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a few months, but I noticed that the lock would sometimes not engage. I realized that the problem was that the bike-attatchment-arm-thingy slid down and was preventing the lock from closing all the way. In addition, after a few months of rain and snow, mine did not seem to work well anymore. I don't know if it was rust, poor lock design, or the cold weather but I couldn't get the damn thing open in the cold. I had to take a blow torch to it to free it up again. Overall this lock is not designed well, go buy a more expensive one you cheapskate
customer_reviews.author: henry

customer_reviews.title: Great design, horrible product
customer_reviews.text: Great design, horrible product!! Item wouldn't lock and now it is on the bike and wont unlock. Will have to cut it off. Will never purchase this product again. What a waste!!
customer_reviews.author: Dotti R Kunnap

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the gamble. Lock receiver jammed on its own.
customer_reviews.text: Before buying, consider this: Here’s the thing, there seems to be quite a discrepancy in many of the reviews which usually mean you’re in a statistical crapshoot. My lock froze the second time I used it. It’s garbage. Obviously, a lot of people got “good” locks and a fair number got junk. This a production issue at one or more levels. Lesson learned. Hopefully they don’t repackage, but that may be happening as well. I didn’t need mine until the weather turned and it’s too late to return it. I don’t think I’d roll the dice on this one again, regardless.
customer_reviews.author: M. Debike

customer_reviews.title: easy to cut through? i miss my bike :(
customer_reviews.text: I started using this after my landlord installed a bike rack in our garage. after 2 weeks, one day, someone just cuts through the lock like its nothing. The cable wasn't even cut at all. bye bye bike ;( Oh yeah, its pretty heavy to carry and the keys feel janky with the lock mechanism. It feels very loose when you put the key in to turn it. You also cant take the key out once its in unlocked position; probably a safety feature so you dont lose the key, but its inconvenient in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Cable cut. Lock drilled.
customer_reviews.text: Came back to the rack in the locked apartment garage to find the thief had drilled out and/or forced the lock which released the U. And then cut the cable. I would have liked this lock and cable to put up a bit more resistance. Definitely overrated.
customer_reviews.author: Seth J Price

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T NOT LOCK!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product should get zero stars. What is the one thing a bicycle lock is suppose to do?? Um let me see.. Give me a minute, lock your bike up. Yup that's it. Well this didn't even do it's job the first time. I just received this lock a couple days ago, and i tried it out for the first time today, and let me tell you it unlocked like butter, but I could not get it to lock right after?? One side will go in, but not the other, so their QC department isn't very good at all. So I'm returning this product and I'm going to purchase a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: Always use both the cord and the U lock!
customer_reviews.text: The lock can be a little tricky sometimes the key gets stuck and I couldn't use the mounting feature due to the type of bike frame I have. But this lock system saved my bike literally the first time I used it. I had the cord wrapped around the frame and front tire and secured with the U lock around my back wheel and frame. When I came back from a walk with a friend to collect our bikes my front wheel came off the frame. Someone tried to take it but realized they couldn't. If I had just used a U lock my front tire would be gone.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Nicole Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: The bicycle lock is heavier than I expected. At times the lock can be a little tedious while opening. (Takes a few minutes to open). Mounting the the lock holder could be a blessing for some and a headache for me. Why? Once I place it in the mounting slot, it swings to the left or right while I’m riding. I may just to relocate mounting slot to the upper bar instead of the seat bar. The cable is definitely thicker than others I’ve used in the past. My plus (having 3 keys), since most locks have two sets of keys.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba T

customer_reviews.title: Good lock
customer_reviews.text: Lots to like about this lock - does almost everything well. The clip to hold the U lock is simple to use - but I do wish that clip could be locked into place a little tighter - the U lock can slip back and forth a little while stored on the frame. Overall though, and especially for the price, much better than the alternatives in this category. It is heavy and a little bulky, but that's the tradeoff needed to deter theft - the light small lock that I'd like to have doesn't really slow a thief down much - this one would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, feels sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only received the product today, but having made this purchase as a replacement for my previous lock (which was easily cut in half, allowing my brand new bike to be stolen), I can already tell this is heavy duty. It’s definitely very well constructed, thick, and weighty. I’m using it for a mountain bike so I don’t mind the extra weight, but if you’re into speed, be warned, this lock definitely puts the HEAVY in heavy duty. It weighs several pounds, but I’m appreciative because I can tell thieves are going to have a hard time breaking through this and I can NOT afford another bike theft! So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great mounting options!
customer_reviews.text: I love the mount. I've tried to mount other locks and they always end up interfering with one of my other accessories (cup holders, usually). With this one, I was able to mount it so that it was behind the center tube. The lock seems beefy. I'm sure someone could bust it open (like could happen with any lock), but it is a hefty deterrent. I'm using my combination lock instead of the cable, just because I don't want to carry the extra weight (I carry the combination cable-lock for when I need to quickly lock the bike when I con't feel the need to use the U-lock).
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike Lock
customer_reviews.text: Great U-Lock for your bike. Very easy to mount on any bike; the mounting mechanism that goes on your bike frame can be adjusted and so can the one on the actual U-Lock, so it makes it very easy to mount on your bike any which way a rider sees fit. The chain cable that also comes with the U-Lock definitely provides additional security to your bike or can be used as an extension to lock two bikes. I do, however, use a velcro strap on the chain cable when carrying on my bike so that it holds tight while riding. Overall, I like the product and would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I still have my bike, but the cable part isn't good and it's hard to set up
customer_reviews.text: Ease of set-up: the parts to attach the ulock to my bike broke and were never useable, so I've needed to lock my cable and ulock to my basket while riding. Usefulness in preventing theft: so-so. The cable was cut through very easily with what I assume were boltcutters. When they attempted to cut through the ulock though, they left some small dents but were unable to successfully cut through the u lock.
customer_reviews.author: Kolb

customer_reviews.title: NOT "made with 16MM steel".
customer_reviews.text: Let me address all the questions about the diameter of the steel in the shackle. Contrary to the claims made by this manufacturer, the shackle is NOT NOT NOT "made with 16MM steel". It is made with 14MM steel. There IS a 2MM soft coating around the steel portion. Many other lock manufactures offer the same 14MM steel shackle with 2MM coating, BUT they are honest about it. This manufacturer references "16MM steel" in several places on their description and when they answer direct questions from consumers here. I am keeping the lock, but I have downgraded my rating because I don't like being lied to.
customer_reviews.author: Hoppie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This thing was on sale from 69.99 and was only 20$. I decided I would give it a try and make this thing is quality! Bolt cutters can’t break this lock at all! Well worth the investment. Easy to lock and unlock, takes seconds to take off the bike mount. Very convenient as I use my bike as my “daily driver” and stop at shops on the way home from work. If you’re on the fence about buying this product, don’t be, just get it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I am a college student and use this product every day. I leave it outside all the time. It has been about 8 months since I have the product and I haven't had any problems with it. There's a little corrosion on the inside holes of the lock but that is not a problem considering I leave it outside even when it is raining.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lock two years ago, got one of the keys and was happy about it. This year I lost one of my keys and I realized the other one didn’t fit the lock and therefore didn’t work. I got in touch with the company and explained the problem through a video and they sent me another lock with three keys functioning properly, even after 2 years of purchase. No moment I felt disrespected or unheard. I would suggest Sigtuna products because they have a great quality and they will make sure you’re satisfied with them. Special thanks to Juna who helped me on the whole process and was very polite.
customer_reviews.author: Cayke

customer_reviews.title: Great durable U-Lock
customer_reviews.text: Great lock... so much that I bought my second one for a friend. Pro: - Easy to install - Durable U lock. So much so that recently, someone has cut through the steel cable but couldn't make it through the U lock. Only the plastic part wrapping outside was sliced up but the U lock holds it own. Con: - The steel cable was easily cut through ( but most steel cables are I think) - Sometime the U-lock can be a bit loose (move back and forth) when it's mounted on the mounting bracket. Overall: for the price and quality, yeah you should get one.
customer_reviews.author: nguyent8

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy practical lock
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this lock almost daily for 4 months with no issue. The bike mount is sturdy and the lock slides in and out with a light press of the button. The lock unlocks and locks smoothly. Just be careful to completely insert the key - The key doesn't lock itself inside the while you turn and it it pulls out during turning the key, the mechanism tends to catch. I hasn't gotten stuck and hasn't caught again since I've been paying deliberate attention to keeping the key completely in while locking and unlocking. Overall, a good purchase for a sturdy lock.
customer_reviews.author: A. Therrien

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my bike as I now live in Dublin and use it for commuting to and from school primarily. The lock works well, comes with 3 keys so I keep one put away, one on my keychain and a spare in my backpack. I particularly like that it came with the cord so if I am unable to adequately lock my bike using the u-lock, I can incorporate the cord to expand its locking reach or to wrap through the tires for extra protection.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: Great bike lock - minor flaws
customer_reviews.text: I live in very bike friendly neighborhood, but unfortunately, it has very high bike and bike tire theft. I bought this to protect my bike because of the good reviews and because it has an extra rope lock - which I use to wrap around on my quick release front tire. The only negatives is that sometimes my key gets stuck inside and won't turn, the U-lock interior is small so it won't fit around some bike racks with the bike main frame, and that its very big and chunky (so I don't attach the clasp to my bike to hang it, I just loop it around my handle bars).
customer_reviews.author: Souljehr

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty quality
customer_reviews.text: When I first ordered the lock, I wasn't expecting it to be very heavy-duty when it arrived. I was certainly pleasantly surprised when it arrived. The locking mechanism others have complained about seemed to operate smoothly. So far I've used the lock a handful of times to run errands around the neighborhood. The cable on the lock is decently thick and seems secure. The mount however does not fit my bike at all which is really unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Payne

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lock without breaking the bank
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Series U (Wodan) 16mm U-lock on Amazon a few weeks ago, and I must say I truly love this lock. I was looking for something that's strong, but not too heavy. Something that came with an easy and secure quick mount. Being picky, I also wanted something that didn't break the bank and unlike other brands, was not an obnoxious neon color. Nonetheless, the SIGTUNA checked off all the boxes. I'm quite happy with this lock - it's black and subtle, doesn't weigh down my bike and most importantly, I feel my bike is protected.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: Great locks
customer_reviews.text: I really like these locks they feel very tough I left my bikes out over night so I used chains instead of the cables. I bought my first Sigtuna Lock over a year ago never had any issues with it I was going to buy the one in second photo again but it was out of stock so believing in the name brand I bought this other model instead. I have used Sigtuna locks as I said over a year now and I like their products and will continue to do so with 2 E Bikes I want to know my stuff is secure.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Bike Lock
customer_reviews.text: This bike lock works extremely well, I have been very impressed with the value for the money. The cable that comes with this lock is very strong, so strong in fact that I even used it to hang a hammock and it remained in tact. The lock works well and it comes with three extra keys which is nice. Additionally the combination of a lock and cable allows me to lock my wheels and frame. Overall it is a wuality bike lock which is able to compete with more expensive brand name locks.
customer_reviews.author: Sister of 3

customer_reviews.title: Great lock
customer_reviews.text: The U lock it self feels solid and has a nice heft to it. It feels much more secure than Kryptonites competing ($35) U lock offering. It fits nicely around frame and wheel and the included mounting hardware is always a plus. The cable is what you can expect with a name brand U lock but I took a star off as the yellow sheathing is much weaker/thinner and split after two uses exposing the crimping piece. Overall it seems like a great lock and I would recommend it over Kryptonites entry level U lock.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: THe lock is fine, the carrier a little loose
customer_reviews.text: A very heavy lock, so, as a thief, I would be intimidated , but who knows how tough it really is? Some web site ran a test and found it took a long time to cut this with a grinder, so I was sold. The lock rattles in the mount when I am riding, so not pleased about that, and I never figured out how to use the cable mount, so I just shove the cable in the pannier. Key works smoothly. One star off for the mounts; otherwise a fine product.
customer_reviews.author: LoRider

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So far my bike is usually where I leave it, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: naked gun

customer_reviews.title: Solid lock
customer_reviews.text: I have this lock since a few days and it is super stable. I feel very safe with this lock. It is ok for 2 bikes. It would be better tho if it would be a bit larger. Nevertheless, I experienced already difficulties in locking the bike. The key seems to occasionally get stuck in the locking process. Means that sometimes I need a few minutes until it actually locks (I also let other people test it so that it's not my stupidity; they had the same problem). That's a bit annoying, but given the price, I'm ok with it. Hence, just 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They won't honor warranty
customer_reviews.text: I had this lock for 2.5 years so it is still within the 3 year warranty. I sent them a video, I agree it wasn't good quality but it was obvious the lock was jammed. Firstly bc this is the issue all the other one star reviews had and also of course that is what happened bc why else would you write them about your lock? Goodness gracious. Bad customer service and I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mcnulty

customer_reviews.title: We're returning it. This thing is HUGE and HEAVY ...
customer_reviews.text: We're returning it. This thing is HUGE and HEAVY. Make absolutely sure that your bike is configured in a way that it can take it on. Unless you have the THIN straight bar from seat to handlebars, this lock may well pose problems with mounting it on your bike (interferes with pedals and braking). Unless it hangs down, it will shift its position while riding your bike. IT IS NOT FOR ALL BIKES. That said, it is highly protective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong, well-built lock.
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely well-built lock. Both sides of the U lock into place very securely. It's a little heavy, but I prefer having a little extra weight rather than a cheaply made lock. The only part that I have concerns about is the mounting bracket. If I hit big bumps at high speeds, will it still hold? I don't know, but on my bike, I mounted the lock to my seat post and used a velcro strap to support the heavy end of the lock to my rear rack.
customer_reviews.author: landi3337

customer_reviews.title: Locking is sticky, but pressing the key firmly down into the hole overcomes this.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a heavy duty, secure lock. Thicker than others of a similar price, so I can have confidence that it will make my bike less appealing than others. Like other users, I found that the key turn to re-lock the device gets stuck. However, if you press the key down into the hole more and then try to turn it, I found this overcomes the stickiness. The mounting bracket does not fit anywhere on my bike without the lock interfering with the moving parts on the bike, but it looks like it fits on others’ bikes so that’s not necessarily a ding against the product.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Krawiec

customer_reviews.title: Durable, reliable, and quality lock set for bikes.
customer_reviews.text: If you are beginner this will give you a sense of safety knowing that your bike is properly secured regardless of neighborhood. Given the sophistication of materials used the quality of this item is reliabel and truly worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Meriem

customer_reviews.title: Excellent security at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This lock provides excellent security - I can't see how anyone could break through it. I've left my bike on the busiest and also shadiest parts of SF for hours and not had a problem. The wire is great for protecting all parts of your bike. I think the weight is worth the level of security this provides. Only downside is the shackle did not fit on my bike's frame, which is small with thicker frame parts. I don't mind too much and just leave the lock hanging on my bike or carry it in my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Vivek Patel

customer_reviews.title: A little fussy on the key lock/unlock function, but otherwise a solid lock choice
customer_reviews.text: The lock/unlock action on this lock occasionally acts a bit fussy on getting the key fully inserted to actuate as intended. The lock opening itself is open to the elements, not sure how that will work in mud/rain/snow/etc. over time. Lock itself is solid construction, a tad heavy, but given the materials used, that's to be expected. The thickness of the U alone should deter would be amateurs from even trying to defeat it. I ended up mounting this to my rear pannier rack using separate velcro and bungees that I already had, since the included bracket mount would not work for my needs, since I consume all mounting areas with water bottles and other accessories...
customer_reviews.author: Scott Allen

customer_reviews.title: I looked at the reviews of all the bike locks and bought the Sigtuna because it was rated the best. After receiving it and trying it out I ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought an Electric Bike and want to make sure it doesn't get stolen. I looked at the reviews of all the bike locks and bought the Sigtuna because it was rated the best. After receiving it and trying it out I understand why it is rated so high - the design makes sense and the cable is sturdy and doesn't seem like it can be cut like other locks that were reviewed negatively. One upgrade would be for it to not need a key since it makes me nervous that I might lose or misplace one of the 3 after another. Can it be Bluetooth enabled or have a combination option for those of us that lose keys?
customer_reviews.author: KKWink

customer_reviews.title: Not a lock I would again purchase .....
customer_reviews.text: I live in San Francisco. A city where a bicycle will be stripped in literally 'seconds'. You see locks left (intact) on racks where bicycles are taken from. Well, I purchased this lock to keep honest people honest. I locked my fat tire bicycle to a bike rack - went into a store for 3 minutes - returning to find thefts had cut the 'U' lock (not the cable) off leaving it behind. The were GONE in 3 minutes! That means the lock was cut in LESS time. Not a quality lock even for 3 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: DION J

customer_reviews.title: Seems good to ,e
customer_reviews.text: I finally got around to mounting this last night. The ulock seems good, and the key is easy to use. It slides in and our of the mount easily. Two critiques: 1 - When the ulock is in the mount, the mount swivels a little, even after I tighten the screw. 2 - The instructions for mounting the ulock were great, but there are no instructions for mounting the flexcable.
customer_reviews.author: novalin

customer_reviews.title: Great lock with only a few minor issues.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this lock, and it is amazing. A few concerns however, I had to take off the mounting piece and turn it upside-down or the actual lock would not work properly, but an easy fix. Secondly, the 1200mm cable confuses me. I can't tame it for the life of me. I think this is just my fault, but if you had some instructions on how to mount it to the bike; that would be very helpful. The lock itself is quite heavy, so I feel safe. I love how it easily mounts on the bike. Overall this lock is well worth the money. I would purchase it again if I had the chance. Great job!
customer_reviews.author: chris goutis

customer_reviews.title: Breaks immediately
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. I bought last October when this was on sale for an end of season deal. I used twice last fall and then put the bike in our garage for the winter (Chicago. It's cold). I've had to jiggle the key quite a bit all summer to get it to unlock. It typically takes 5+ minutes to get it to actually work). I used it about five times this summer before the key broke in the lock. Honestly, I'm pretty cheap - Next time, I will spend more on a lock that works more than half a dozen times. .
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gould

customer_reviews.title: The lock is great. It would take more than just your average ...
customer_reviews.text: The lock is great. It would take more than just your average bum with wire cutters to steal your bike, given you locked your bike up with this lock properly. It came with more parts than I was expecting, a few that I don't even know how to use, since it wasn't explained well or at all. Keep in mind the U-lock is somewhat short so when you lock up your bike frame, your bike must be placed very close to the bar in which you're locking it up to. Also, the bar cannot be too thick.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Decent but loose holder for the frame.
customer_reviews.text: The lock itself feels solid. Obviously I didin't attempt to cut through it so how do you REALLY review a lock?? :) I only gave it 3 stars because it doesn't sit firm/tight in the lock holder on the bike frame. It is super loose and rattles a lot when i'm riding around which is disappointing. (to be clear, the holder is tight on the frame, only the lock is loose in the holder). Build quality seems good otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: filthy

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what a great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product really works great I can confidently leave my bike locked up anywhere I want without fear of it being cut or stolen. This really is a great safe product for your bicycle if used properly. Also the company itself that makes this bike is really great and has awesome customer service. definitely would buy this product again because it just works great. I would suggest making extra copy of keys and you'll need an abloy distributor to a laser cut the key but other than that it's a great product
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Solid value with good customer support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lock as a first bike lock for a new cyclist. When I tried to attach the mounting bracket and it broke. After an email to the customer support team I quickly had a new bracket in the mail that worked perfectly. When locked there is still a slight looseness/rattle at the connection point, but it does not seem to compromise the security of the lock in any way. Bottom line: solid value, will deter people from taking your bike. Customer support is great.
customer_reviews.author: Molly J

customer_reviews.title: Could be great if you get matching keys
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to open the lock upon opening the package because the keys sent with it didn't match. I'm currently waiting to hear back from customer service. The lock itself seems well built and is heavy. The mount that was included also seems like it would be very easy to use (there's a security button to slide it out of the part of the mount that secures to the bike. I just wish I could use it
customer_reviews.author: Kris H.

customer_reviews.title: Overall first impression: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: Overall first impression: It's okay. When locked, the crossbar is not held firmly. I expected it to be firmly held in place but you can rattle it around. It seems that the locking mechanism does not fully engage the notches on the crossbar. The pictures also make it look like the silver piece in the middle of the crossbar is metal but it's actually plastic. The key doesn't fit into the lock like you would expect it to. The key feels loose within the lock so I can see how others have had issues with the keys breaking. I guess it's about what I expected for the price, but definitely not a 5-star product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, but sturdy and thicker bar than most
customer_reviews.text: I've used this lock only a couple of times so far, but I like it. The cable is a nice added bonus and the bar is very thick. It is heavy, but that doesn't get in the way as it is mounted to my frame when not in use. My only issue to far is that when locking it, you have to leave to key in and turned to "unlock". Then to lock it, you have to turn the key again. I had assumed the key would only be needed for unlocking. Not a big issue, just slightly inconvenient. I would recommend overall though!
customer_reviews.author: A. Cavalier

customer_reviews.title: Brittle Plastic Parts Break
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this lock. There is a plastic mounting bracket and a plastic sheath around the locking bar. The mounting bracket broke the day the lock arrived while I was attaching it to the frame as directed. Worse—the plastic around the locking bar broke within two months of regular use. Now I have to buy a new lock. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality. A couple nits: The silver plastic sleeve is hard to rotate, when opening and closing the key hole. The holder is loose (not adjustable) so it rattles a lot when riding. Not a huge deal, but kind of annoying. Confidential to Sigtuna rep: Thanks for your quick response. Turns out it was user error on our part haha. My wife was trying to use a different key to open it! So sorry for the harsh words. I've gone back up to 3 stars. Pretty good quality lock.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Salas

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but unwieldy
customer_reviews.text: This lock seems to be holding up really well; it’s one of the thicker locks I’ve come across, and the mounting system is cleverly designed and easy to install. The cable is long enough to keep both wheels locked, but I do have to angle the lock to get it through the rear wheel and frame. It is a hefty lock, so it might be difficult to mount symmetrically with the frame instead of asymmetrically. The mechanism works very smoothly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lock for my son because I liked the cable and mounting features. He locks his bike at a busy urban school and theft is a big worry. I agree with other reviewers: it is heavy, but it is also very secure. He used this lock successfully for 9 months before it jammed and couldn't open one side. I contacted the seller who replaced it -- no questions asked. I like the lock and love the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: M. Haage

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Lock
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lock due to the good reviews and "Amazon's Choice". First complaint is that the locking mechanism and keys are extremely flimsy. After 3 uses, one of my keys broke off in the locking mechanism and required pliers to remove. Additionally, the frame-mount mechanism is made of plastic, as is the piece that holds the U-lock in the frame mount. After 6 months of light use, the plastic "clip" stressed to the point of breaking, causing me to lose my lock (unknowingly) mid-ride. This lock isn't worth the low price - keep looking for something of better quality!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: First off, most bicycle locks come with two keys and the added 3rd key is great in case I lose one of the two. The mounting feature was very easy to install and one of the key items that convinced me to purchase this bicycle (other than positive reviews of course). This set is exactly what I was looking for (U-lock plus cable) and a little more. The U-lock is thick and I'm confident my bike is secured every time I ride it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Min

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, it feels good to lock up my bike with it. I can also lock up other bikes when we ride together. I immediately knew I liked the product when they sent me a personal email thanking me and sending me a guide to proper use of the lock. Its the little things like that, that make me like and feel more attached to the product. The lock holder is amazing because it just hangs out until I need to lock it up. I would like to see a better solution for the cord to bring it along as well, but I just wrap it around the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Isak

customer_reviews.title: would not lock after two uses, would not unlock.
customer_reviews.text: I used this lock twice. For some unknown reason, the "tooth" on one side of the mechanism would not retract all the way. I was screwed so bad, choosing to force the lock closed. Bad move, it would not unlock so I got to walk 4 miles to get my car and a 3lb sledge hammer. I made short work of the lock, since one side disengaged to give me an angle to exploit on the P.O.S.
customer_reviews.author: Child Bride

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with the lock and cable
customer_reviews.text: I feel very confident when using this lock and cable to secure my bike. It is really heavy so if you attach to your bike with the supplied bracket, you will have to pedal with more weight ( no pain no gain.) It does not fit on my Raleigh Willard 1 52 cm frame so I will keep it in my rear rack trunk bag. I received a card in the box that said "receive free bike lights? Review@sigtunagear.com so I tried that and I could only get to the website with their products, but couldn't find anyway to leave a review. Oh well... I'm happy with the lock and cable.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Sigtuna is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about the folks at Sigtuna, and this is NOT from an endorser who got a free product. I received the 16mm U bolt bike lock for Christmas and it is even better than advertised. Simple to install with multiple options, easy to use, and damn secure. I noticed the feedback card that came with the product had a promo to get a free light set if you provided feedback. After doing that I was contacted by Sigtuna in less than 24 hours, provided a bit more info, and received a great light set in less than a week!. Front and back lights with multiple flash patterns. Great customer service and great products!
customer_reviews.author: LilyAnnecy

customer_reviews.title: Great lock, great price
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a good lock for a while and after I got the Fahgedaboutit u-lock, I realized I don't need such a heavy and expensive lock cause even if it takes longer for a thief to get to your bike, no lock is indestructible. So I decided to go for Sigtuna's 16mm U-lock with cable. It's heavy enough to give you confidence but still very easy to carry especially with the extra mount (which by the way, works better on round frames. If you have thicker frames just make sure you screw it tightly.) It was missing a keyhole cover but customer service was really helpful.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: NOT a theft deterrent device!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I was hoping to purchase a lock that would deter a thief in a low threat environment. On campus for only eight days, a thief quickly defeated this lock and departed with my daughte's bike. Locked in a well lit, highly traveled area next to her college dorm, this "high security" lock did nothing to prevent the theft of her bike. Would NOT recommend this product to anyone wanting to realistically secure their property.
customer_reviews.author: John Elsey

customer_reviews.title: Better than a cable lock!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got the product with free one day shipping. This u lock is builthe very well and is a lot better than the cheap cable lock I had on my bike when it was stolen. Update: Product has broke after 3 days. The key will only turn halfway and lock can not be used due to the u part not going in to the shackle
customer_reviews.author: Terrike W.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty lock???
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lock August 14, 2017 for my daughter at college. She has used it only 4 times and now it has quit working/locking. When I turn the key the internal mechanism does not move. One side is in lock position and the other side of the bolt is in unlock positon. It has not been abused, tampered with, broken into etc. At first by reading the reviews I thought I had bought a top notch bike lock but now I am not sure. I will be contacting the manufacturer and see what they will or will not do.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Feels solid but jammed quickly
customer_reviews.text: I received this bike lock very quickly via Amazon prime and within 24 hours of ordering, Sigtuna contacted me via e-mail to provide customer support in case I needed it. The lock itself feels very sturdy and trustworthy and the mounting bracket works perfectly, I am not worried about it falling off while riding through the city. The problem came when within two days of owning the lock, it jammed. I removed the lock from my bike and when I was trying to put the crossbar back on the U it just wouldn’t close no matter which way I turned the key. :-( seemed like a sturdy lock for a good price but perhaps the mechanics need to be redesigned.
customer_reviews.author: T. Quintana

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: So far I’m on the fence. I find the lock too short for most bike racks. The lock sometimes stick not allowing me to secure lock in public. I have a light bike and carry it in and out of my house, due to placement of look I cannot do this without removing lock from attachment. The cable holder does not secure to frame tight enough causing cable to loosen while riding. Overall, the lock is still new to me and may get better with practice, on the other hand it could get worse. It’s worth a try and if your not happy get a new one. I priced these at other places and very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Tom D.

customer_reviews.title: Lock broke after less than a year of use.
customer_reviews.text: Lock held up for a few months, but after a cold night yesterday it seems to have met its demise. Turning the lock with the key no longer triggers the lock. I let the lock sit inside the home overnight to see if maybe it was frozen, but nothing changed. $40 down the drain. If you are looking for a long term bike solution (assuming these five star reviews were written within a month or two of purchase) check elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: KAG2020

customer_reviews.title: The best part is the frame attachment so I don't have ...
customer_reviews.text: The best part is the frame attachment so I don't have to lug around the U lock. The U lock itself does wiggle when it is attached, but it won't fall off. I do wish it fit more snugly into the frame attachment. Otherwise great lock, long cable but not too long, and secure. Love that it comes with three copies of the key. I don't use the velcro attachment for the cable- it's easier to just carry it with me, but it's a nice option at least. I use this lock in Baltimore, and I'm comfortable leaving my bike on the street with this lock. That should convince you.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Roberto

customer_reviews.title: great lock
customer_reviews.text: The lock works great in every way, the only downfall is that it doesn't work well on women's bikes since there isn't as much room between the two bars for us. Due to that fact, it is close to my water bottle holder and the lock always pushes my water bottle out. Besides that, the actual functionality of it works great!
customer_reviews.author: TDoubleJ

customer_reviews.title: Value price for a solid u-lock and chain cable
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product. Key is a little difficult to lock sometimes, unless perfectly aligned and the mounting bracket on the u-lock slips, so you may need to try different positions in your bikeframe to find the best position for minimal movement while riding. Would recommend this lock!
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Jammed lock after two months, had to return it
customer_reviews.text: I had the lock for two months and it worked fine, it got stuck every so often though. But then it got jammed after not using it for a week and it stopped working completely. I tried WD-40 but the u portion won’t connect with the lock portion anymore. It happened past the amazon return period. I contacted Sigtuna customer service and they determined it was a manufacturing defect and are sending another one to me. I’m hoping the second one doesn’t also jam!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Affordable choice for a secondary lock
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a secondary, affordable u-lock to secure my front wheel to the frame and found this reasonably priced Sigtuna lock to do the job well. One thing I would love for Sigtuna to offer is a program similar to Key Safe, so that if our keys get damaged/stolen, Sigtuna can provide a free replacement key. Secondly, the way you put the key in matters and there seems to be no visible markings on the key indicating the correct position. I'd appreciate some branding on the key that indicates which way the key should be put in. I'll be updating this review as time goes on. Last updated 7/31/19.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo P.

customer_reviews.title: Great lock & customer service; okay mounting bracket
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this lock for a year now and it has held up great. It's been outside in wind, rain, sleet, snow, heat, and humidity. The keys and locking mechanism still function perfectly. My one gripe about this product is the mounting bracket developed a vertical crack on me about 6 months in. I've used super glue to great effect, but it wasn't cutting it after a couple months. When I emailed the seller about this, they were quick to address the issue and send me a new mounting bracket when it was in stock. For the price, this definitely deserves 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great U-lock for my bike. Very good valur for the money
customer_reviews.text: I just received my lock from Sigtuna. I am must say that the quality is great, it is very sturdy and well designed. I alo like the fact that it is not too big and fits perfectly in my bike. I also like that it has a sliding mechanism that completely covers the keyhole, protecting it from the rain. Very recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Ricardo Barriga

customer_reviews.title: Great value, superior quality, & overall great purchae
customer_reviews.text: Tremendous bike lock compared to my previous one (Masterlock U-Lock). I'm a new cyclist and the previous lock was just something I picked up at the same time when I purchased my first bike. I never thought the brand of lock would matter too much, but it's like night and day. The Sigtuna lock comes in a sleep package with detailed instructions. The mount is incredibly easy to install and has been very sturdy so far. I don't think I've had any issues with theft, but I'll post an update if any sort of attempt is made.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mike Honcho

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bike lock
customer_reviews.text: The lock looks sturdy. It mounts on the bike very easily and has a quick release button, which is great for riding with the heavy lock. I like that it comes with two spare keys and has the cable with it's own mount for days when the lock won't reach. Sellers delivered quickly.
customer_reviews.author: ximena

customer_reviews.title: 2 Solid Bike Locks for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: First, there aren't any locks that can promise to prevent 100% of bike thefts. However, with that said, the Sigunta 16mm Heavy Duty U-Lock is a great lock! It's solid and not too heavy. I used the included mount and mounted it to the frame of my cruiser bike. Outside of a faint jiggling, I don't even know it's there. It's a nice bonus that they include a separate chain lock, as well. I use the U-Lock to lock the back tire and frame to the actual bike rack and the chain lock & a padlock to anchor the frame and front tire to the rack as well. It's worked out great and can't be beat for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Burrows

customer_reviews.title: Used only 3 times, stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used the lock for about 3 times total. I went to go lock my bike and the bar wouldn’t even attach. I tried to see if the lock could open when the key was turned in, but nope. Nothing. The key just twists in the hole as if it’s a baby toy and I’m just pretending to have a bike lock. I regret not reading all the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Maybelline

customer_reviews.title: A Beast of a Lock
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the best lock out there for the money. However, for the style bike I have the mounting bracket will not fit on the top tube. Also, I would need to remove a bottle cage leaving me with only one. It is also very heavy, which I know is necessary for an 8/10 security lock. So, I am going to try one of SigTuna's other locks like the Vidar-8, which may be a better fit. I received follow up emails immediately after delivery so this shows that this company really has it together on the customer service side. I give it 5 stars because there is nothing wrong with the product for it's intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: I have had this U lock less than a year and the locking mechanism has stopped working. The key will not move the metal piece that allows the two pieces to connect together and lock up. It worked for about 7 months total. It is just so unfortunate that it is not built to last because it is very heavy duty... what a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This lock is heavy duty and comes with a nice long cable. The mounting bracket didn't fit will in my frame but I made it work. The lock broke after a month but the company replaced it quickly. The customer service was fantastic and all companies should follow their example. The new lock works perfectly and I'd buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Lasted ~45 days
customer_reviews.text: My lock never functioned well but I thought the design was a little off. But less than 2 months later it was broken specifically would not unlock... Sooo grateful that it wasn't on the bike at the time because that would have been so much more inconvenient
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I compared different sizes and price points. I went into several bike shops to see what they offered. This bike lock appeared to be the best value. I have only had it for a few weeks but it is easy to operate and is very secure. I think this is a great choice, especially for the money- compared to other more expensive options.
customer_reviews.author: zac land

customer_reviews.title: One brawny lock!
customer_reviews.text: The lock and attachments are great. But, different size frame tubing...and style of bike, can make mounting this a challenge. I had to cut a piece of thicker rubber hose tubing, to get the mounting clamp to stay in place, on my daughter's bike. Be creative and be like MacGyver. She uses it at a college campus that's notorious for bike thievery. After two years of having it parked everywhere on campus and in town (even at night)...she still has a bike. The thickness of the lock must act as a deter thieves.
customer_reviews.author: YesSir

customer_reviews.title: Looks secure.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I like how you have to have the key in the entire time locking and unlocking, I feel that provides an added security. Also, the middle part can be moved so when your done locking, the hole where the key goes can be hidden. I’m not sure if mine is broken or if it’s meant to be this way, either way, I like that. Unfortunately my bike does not have circular tubing , so I am not able to use the mounting system. Either way, this looks well, will update with continuous use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Castrejon

customer_reviews.title: High price for average quality
customer_reviews.text: Really not impressed. Nearly $60 for something that's quite poorly put together. The metal components (u-bar/chord) are great! Their mounting mechanisms are absolutely flimsy however. The little belt style strap for the front wheel cable shifts around an immense amount. The plastic mounting point for the actual u-lock is questionable. For mounting I've just decided to keep the locks in my backpack. The U-locks mechanism is quite irritating. The key needs to be fully turned one direction in order for the lock to fully close. Anyways, for $30 I would've been totally ok, but for something clearly priced above the competition one would expect better mounting quality. The U-lock itself is great and gets the work done!
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Best lock for the price
customer_reviews.text: This bike is absolutely the best for this price. It provides the same level of protection that other locks that cost 3 times more provide, there is a little flex between bolts and lock and I am not sure if it's my unit, but that doesn't prevent it from securing the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Garegin

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: No lock is perfect, but this certainly gets the job done. Everything secures easily with the ulock through the frame and the cable looped though the front wheel. I added another short cable for the set. The only drawback was finding a place to mount it. The clamp is too small for the newer fat tubes like many of the e-bikes have. I had to hang this off the rack which is too small for the clamp. All in all, it's working out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Matronista

customer_reviews.title: Lock is heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This lock is heavier duty than I expected, I will feel fairly confident no one is going to be stealing it, the one downside is extra weight to carry so that's the tradeoff. More security means you need more steel. The order was delivered on time, in good condition. Thanks Sigtuna for a high quality yet not overpriced product.
customer_reviews.author: archangel485

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item last March 2020 and its only now that I am giving my review. I have no regrets with my decision to purchase this over other well rated brands. My lock gets the job done considering in the city where I lived, stolen bikes happened regularly. One thing I noticed though, the lock is covered by a rubber which is thicker. The 16mm measurement includes the rubber I mentioned. Still, it was solid.
customer_reviews.author: Mervin Miguel

customer_reviews.title: When I lock my bike, i'm not worried.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lock and appreciate that it comes with a holder. I'm still trying to figure out the best way to store the flex cable, but the bracket works awesome. The only issue that I had -and i hope Sigtuna wil consider this- is that the part of the mounting bracket that lives on the 'U' piece can slide on the lock. I spend 10 minutes struggling to lock the shackle because I couldn't push the base on all the way due to the bracket interfering with it. I was able to slide it up the shackle by hitting it with a screwdriver. A minor inconvenience, but solved quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A Hester

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue early on with the mounting bracket not securing tightly to my bike and part of it fell off rendering the rest of it useless. I forgot about it for 2 years and figured instead of ordering a new one I'd contact customer service. They were willing to ship me a new mounting bracket for free! Great response time and turnaround. Overall the U lock and cable work great, no one has attempted to steal my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Lin

customer_reviews.title: Only for adrenaline addicts that wants to get stranded
customer_reviews.text: First 3 months was fine item is shining and seemed pretty solid than one day the key got stuck leaving me stranded in a random location. After using some force(just muscles) the bike lock broke at least saving my bike from its unfortunate destiny. Don't ever buy or recommend this product unless you are an adrenaline addict !!! Not only it could be broken down easily by pulling but also the lock mechanism sucks!
customer_reviews.author: bera zengin

customer_reviews.title: The lock wouldn't work after one use.
customer_reviews.text: The lock worked the first time my wife, for whom I purchased it, locked her bike, almost a year after the purchase. It was then removed from the bike and locked while awaiting the next time the bike needed to be secured (two days later). However, it then could not be unlocked by either me or my wife. I thought my wife had just tried to use the wrong key(s) until I looked at other Amazon reviews and saw that many people had the same problem. We are fortunately among the lucky ones who did not have a bike locked up with this thing at the time the problem occurred.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

product_meta.title: SIGTUNA Bike locks - 16mm Heavy Duty U Lock with U-Lock Shackle and Bicycle Lock Mount Holder + 1200mm Steel Chain Cable Bike Lock
feature_bullets: PROTECT YOUR RIDE ✔️ This awarded SIGTUNA Bike U-lock is made of 16MM High-Performance Steel for Extensive Holding Power and Resistance against Cut and Leverage attacks with a wapping 85/100 Security Rating. Get the best security available and protect your ride with Sigtuna Locks!

CHOOSE POWER ✔️ This Bike Lock Combination has a High-Security Disc-Style Cylinder and Double Deadbolt locking mechanism, very effective and certified against Leverage Attacks. With SIGTUNA you make the right choice and give thieves no chance!

EASY-TO-USE ✔️ This model SIGTUNA Bike Lock Combination comes with a Easy-to-Install Bike Lock Mount, a Protective Coating to protect your bikes paint and not 2, but 3 Laser-Cut Abloy Keys. With this lock you get Security AND Convenience!

100% MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE ✔️ If this U-lock is not the favorite you ever owned - some say it is heavy, but that means quality - just send it back and get a 100% refund. SIGTUNA stands for its products. Our customers love that, we know you will too!
ORDER YOURS NOW ‎▶‎▶ Click "Add to Cart" NOW to get your 16mm SIGTUNA Bike U lock with 1200mm Flex Cable + Mount Bracket tomorrow and give your Bike the Love it deserves.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
